relation: In DP 67 Jessie beats Kenny's Prinplup and won her first ribbon.
In DP 102 while Ash was fighting Fantina, Jessie is seen participating in a Pokémon Contest in which she won with her Yanmega.

In DP 146 Jessie was very sick so James disguised himself Jesselina was presented with Meowth and were won the contest after Carnivine winning over a Tyrogue (after having defeated Dawn's Mamoswine in the Semi-Final).
In DP 167 Jessie competed in a contest in which Johanna (Dawn's mother) was a judge.
In DP 171 Jessie lost in the contest. Princess Salvia, disguised as Dawn, gave her the ribbon for the performance she gave during their battle in the Final round.
textBeforeTable: Ribbons Add a photo to this gallery grand festival Jessilina at the ribbon Jessilina and her fifth Sinnoh Jessilina pumped up Jessilina
textAfterTable: Grand Festival ranking Jessie placed in the following Grand Festival competitions: Sinnoh Grand Festival(Top 4) Relationships with Pokémon Jessie has a strong relationship with her Pokémon and wants more, even if they seem evil. She had a great friendship with a Blissey who she knew long ago, Jessie never wanted to take this Pokémon with her because she knew it would not be happy living as she lives (because that Blissey is very affectionate and friendly). Her hair has been cut/eaten on several occasions and this is something that saddens and gets her very upset. Jessie is not very smart to say, so if in doubt she goes to James to have things cleared up. She is said to be bad but sometimes shows herself to have a good, even childish, heart. Jessie, James, and Meowth dream of catching Ash's Pikachu since they first got "blasted off" by its attack, and although rarely they do succeed they never actually give it straight away to their boss, Giovanni, which is what they always dreamed of doing. She, James, and Meowth are fired multiple times into the sky out of
